text: obagē bhāryayāvangen kavurun hō obagen ven vī pratikṣēpa karannan veta gos (æyaṭa viyadam kaḷa vastuva ovun vetin nolæbī) tibiyadī ē venuven (ovungē viśvāsaya tæbū bhāryayāvan venuven labā diya yutu dæyen) kisivak oba navatāgena siṭiyahot (nætahot pratikṣēpa karannan samaga yuddhayak æti vī ovungē vastuva oba at kara gattā vuvada), eyin (obagen) kavurungē bhāryayāvan pratikṣēpa karannan veta giyōda, ovun venuven (ovungē svāmipuruṣayin) viyadam kaḷa dæya men dæyak labā denu. oba (mema kāraṇāvehi) allāhṭa biya vanu. (mandayat) ohuvama oba viśvāsa kara ættehuya
